class.rdfs:comment: An entity holding detailed information about the available bed types, e.g. the quantity of twin beds for a hotel room. For the single case of just one bed of a certain type, you can use bed directly with a text. See also [[BedType]] (under development).
class.rdfs:label: BedDetails

schema:numberOfBeds.rdfs:comment: The quantity of the given bed type available in the HotelRoom, Suite, House, or Apartment.
schema:numberOfBeds.rdfs:label: numberOfBeds

schema:typeOfBed.rdfs:comment: The type of bed to which the BedDetail refers, i.e. the type of bed available in the quantity indicated by quantity.
schema:typeOfBed.rdfs:label: typeOfBed
